column3: Sɛ obi pɛ ɔhwɛfo edwuma a
ɔsɛ ɔhwɛfo dɛ no ho nnyi asɛm
ma ne mba hyɛ n'ase wɔ fɔntɔmmyɛ nyina mu;"

column2: "na sɛ obi nnhu nankasa ne fi do hwɛ a
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn tum hwɛ Nyankopɔn n'asɔr do?"

column2: "Mma ɔnnyɛ obi a ɔbaa asɔr no mu nkyɛree
column3: amma ɔaannhoran annkɔtɔ abɔnsam n'afɔbu mu."

column2: "Afei so ɔsɛ dɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ ekyir so bɔ no dzin pa; amma ɔaannhwe enyimguase nye abɔnsam efir mu."
"Dɛmara na asɔr mu asomfo no so ɔsɛ dɛ hɔn enyim yɛ fɔntɔmm
"wɔkora gyedzi esumasɛm no wɔ tsibowa a no ho tsew mu."
"Na yinom so wondzi kan nsɔ hɔn nhwɛ ana
column3: sɛ hɔn ho nnyi asɛm bi a

column2: "Mbaa so hɔn enyim nyɛ fɔntɔmm dɛmara
column4: mbom nkorɔfo a hɔn enyi da hɔ
column5: na wodzi nokwar wɔ adze nyina mu."

column2: "Asɔr mu asomfo no mu biara nyɛ nyimpa a ne yer kor a wɔhwɛ hɔn mba nye hɔnankasa hɔn fie do yie."
"Na hɔn a wɔasom yie dɛ asɔr mu asomfo no
column4: nye ndamyɛ kɛse wɔ gyedzi a ɔwɔ Kraest Jesus mu no mu."

column2: "M'enyi da kwan dɛ ɔnnkɛkyɛr na maba wo nkyɛn

column3: eehu mbrɛ ɔsɛ dɛ ebɔ wo bra wɔ Nyankopɔn fie a ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn tseasefo n'asɔr mu a ɔyɛ nokwar no ne fadum nye ne ngyinado no."

column2: "Na ekyingye nnyi ho dɛ nyamesom esumasɛm no so ampaara; Nyankopɔn daa no ho edzi wɔ honam mu
column3: wobuu no bem wɔ sunsum mu
column5: wɔbɔɔ no dawur wɔ amanaman mu
column7: wɔfaa no kɔr sor wɔ enyimnyam mu."
